explains: vt. 获得；储存；把……储入谷仓

sentences.en: The garner can help the old remember things for longer.
sentences.cn: 储存能帮助老年人更长久地记住事情。

sentences.en: We have no problem understanding a movie where somebody goes to sleep as a teenager and wakes up as Jennifer Garner, as an older person.
sentences.cn: 我们完全能够看懂电影中一个少女睡去，一觉醒来却变成了老年人詹妮弗·加纳。

sentences.en: Blue diamonds have been known to garner high prices.
sentences.cn: 蓝钻众所周知价格很高。
